description:
T1 Holly - Reduce all aspects of crown by approx 1-2m back to previous points of reduction, Remove epicormic growth.
T2 Pear - Reduce all aspects of crown by 1.5-2m back to previous points of reduction.
T3 Magnolia - Reduce in height by approx 3m and trim the sides to match.
T4 Apple - Reduce all aspects of crown by approx 1m back to previous points of reduction. 
T5 Apple - Reduce all aspects of crown by approx 1-1.5m back to previous points of reduction. 
T6 Bay - Trim side of the tree overhanging from no.20.
T9 Cherry - Reduce all aspects of crown by 1.5-2m back to previous points of reduction. 
T10 Laburnam - Trim all around to create a tight and tidy shape.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
